ack.p: We thank Marie van der Wielen, Roland Manil and Corey Mallett at GSK for providing AS03 and cH5/1 and cH8/1 split vaccines. We also thank Larisa Rudenko and Irina Isakova-Sivak at the Institute of Experimental Medicine (St. Petersburg, Russia) for their help with the LAIV backbone selection, David Wentworth at the CDC for rescuing the cH8/1 LAIV virus and David Suarez at the USDA for virus pathotyping. Furthermore, we thank the team at PATH for help with the coordination of the project.
